translations: n．斜面，倾斜角：一个倾斜的边缘或表面，通常在两个平面之间。
· The carpenter cut bevels on the edges of the wooden frame.
木匠在木框的边缘切割斜面。
v．倾斜，斜削：使一个边缘或表面倾斜，通常在两个平面之间。

sentences.sentence: This will build the grip up a full or half size and still keep the bevels fairly sharp.

sentences.sentence: Flatness, bevels, and finishes are to be uniform. Blade surfaces must be free from scratches.
